----- Original Message -----
From: Snicker <snicker@...>

Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 4:51 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Extra Money (Actually - some language
stuff)


> From: Snicker <snicker@...>
>
> At 09:51 PM 5/9/99 -0700, you wrote:
> >From: David Robinson <daverobinson@...>
> <garbage deleted>
>
> This account has been reported for abuse of the AllAdvantage system.
>
> Back to on topic stuff. In regards to languages, as all classes advance,
> they gain the ability to learn additional languages. Like many skills, at
> least 1 point must be spent to begin learning the language. Skill
> increases with practice - such as listening to two buddies argue in Old
> Erudian.
>
> Talies the Wanderer
> http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> To unsubscribe from this mailing list, or to change your subscription
> to digest, go to the ONElist web site, at http://www.onelist.com and
> select the Member Center link from the menu bar on the left.
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell
research. Please keep the emails on topic.
